text.content:
Better to Give

You hit yourself instead of the target.

Melee

Weapon Problem

If the attack used a projectile weapon, something on the weapon malfunctions, requiring you to spend 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Interact]{Interact} actions to fix.

Ranged

Sneeze

You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Slowed]{Slowed 1} until the end of your next turn.

Unarmed

Spell Rush

You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Stupefied]{Stupefied 1} until healed.

Spell
